description: XDM Schema for the common event component 'EventHeader/EventMetadata/PartyAtts'

Xfuze.description: The (optional) Xfuze derived / enriched attributes that define the context of the (primary) party involved in this particular instance of the event

PartyId.description: The (optional) canonical top level PartyId, identifying the physical party (e.g person, organisation, group), as the single ID source of truth across systems - typically only derivable by the EventProcessors e.g Party_69a79ae0-1d10-46b3-8dd2-7455c622aae2

SystemPartyId.description: The (required) canonical party Id, for a given system, uniquely identifying the party within that specific system (as opposed to across systems which is the case for the above PartyId) e.g Party_SFCC_123456789

SystemAccountId.description: The (optional) canonical top level AccountId of the account this event relates to e.g Account_SFCC_987654321

PartyRoleTypeCode.description: The (required) type of behavioural role of the party with respect to the involvement in this event e.g Customer.  A party can assume multiple roles, this role is the one WRT this specific event

PartyRoleSubTypeCode.description: The (optional) sub type of the top level role of the party with respect to the involvement in this event to further refine the top level role to be more accurate and specific e.g Purchaser, Recipient, DeliveryRecipient etc.

PartyStatusCode.description: The (optional) canonical status of the party as was at the time of this event e.g Registered

InvolvedReasonCode.description: The (optional) canonical reason code as to they this party was involved in the event e.g Purchaser

Origin.description: The 'origin' source / raw attributes provided as input and that were consumed as part of producing the companion 'Xfuze' representations

SystemPartyId.description: Raw form (as provided) of the input SystemPartyId (e.g CustomerId) from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations e.g 123456789

SystemAccountId.description: Raw form (as provided) of the input SystemPartyId (e.g CustomerAccountId) from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations to e.g Account_SFCC_987654321

PartyRoleTypeCode.description: Raw form (as provided) of the input PartyRoleTypeCode (e.g Customer or Employee, but more often derived by Xfuze then supplied as input) from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations

PartyStatusCode.description: Raw form (as provided) of the input PartyStatusCode (e.g Customer or Employee Status codes)  from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations e.g Registered
